page.title: 12Religion in the area
page.content:
There are many different religions represented in Rossett.
Christ Church is the Anglican church in the centre of Rossett. There are three Sunday services and the church is fully involved in village life. There is an Anglican church in Pulford called St. Mary's.
The Catholic church in Rossett is set of the main road. The services are taken by Mr Daley.
In Station Road, Rossett, there is a Presbyterian church, school room and hall. The minister is Mr.J.Davies. There are two Sunday services and a large Sunday school.
